subject: Re: Simsonn Order Confirmation #SSN1578
description_text:
Let’s go with upgrade to Plus Upgrade P-3 Black. Thank you, Chris Sent from my iPhone On Jun 3, 2025, at 11:33 PM, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote: ﻿
 
 
 
 
 
 


 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 SIMSONN
 
 

 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Hi, the Pro Plus P3-H3 / Black you purchased is out of stock at our US warehouse, we can upgrade you to the Plus Upgrade P3/ Black or replace it with the Pro Plus P3-H3/ Silver for free, which offer would you prefer? 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Chris Haemmerle,  Alright, we will arrange the shipment of your order tomorrow.
